name: q2_project
description: This is a project for my sister to have her be more efficient. She wants a digital rolodex to mainly keep track of her clients to send mailers to. I will be making a clients, agents and inventory database to help her keep track of specific clients, birthday and license renewals of agents and select inventory within the office. I will be using Materialize as framework and Supertest, Mocha and Chai to run tests. I will also import in google maps as an external app to locate the clients she has.
